AdditionalFields.Value: Bioinformatics / Computational Biology / Systems Biology / Convergent Science,Cancer Evolution

Description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) methods are rapidly improving and will have a profound influence on oncology and cancer research in the coming years. In this session, we will provide a high-level overview on the capabilities and limitations of AI. We will show how AI is already being used as a tool to diagnose and subtype cancer in clinical routine, and as a research tool to understand tumor biology and provide new biomarkers. The speakers will cover AI applications for histopathology and radiology image data, clinical data and text, aiming to convey a fundamental understanding of current and future AI methods.
PrimaryCategory: Bioinformatics / Computational Biology / Systems Biology / Convergent Science
SearchResultBody: ED028. AI is Here to Stay: Its impact in Cancer Research
Title: AI is Here to Stay: Its impact in Cancer Research
